items.name: Study Explorer
items.tooltip: Use free-text search and tags to rapidly find relevant studies.

items.name: Data Explorer
items.tooltip: The Exploration Page enables discovery of the data at the subject level and features a cohort builder.

items.name: Data Dictionary
items.tooltip: The Data Dictionary serves to inform the data model and is updated as new data is ingested.

items.name: Profile
items.tooltip: Create API keys for programmatic data access, and review your authorization privileges to datasets and services.
